inclusion.criterion: Histologically proven anaplastic oligodendroglioma or oligoastrocytoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Progressed or relapsed after surgery or radiation therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female or male aged 20 years or over
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: serum creatinine less than 1.5 times the upper limit of laboratory normal

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and has undergone radiation therapy. The patient's current condition is complicated by progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention.
